Colors

All Sass color variables prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

Brand Colors

$color-dark-blue
#1F3A53
$color-light-blue
#A1D3DF
$color-lighter-blue
#80BDCB
$color-orange
#E15B00
$color-orange-hover
#F17520
$color-black
#000000
$color-white
#FFFFFF

Grays

$color-silver-chalice
#B0B0B0
$color-silver-dark
#BFBFBF
$color-silver
#CCCCCC
$color-gallery
#EBEBEB

Messages

$color-success-bg
#DFF0D8
$color-warning-bg
#FCF8E3
$color-error-bg
#F2DEDE
Source: utils/_colors.scss, line 1
